stories.text: I was talking recently with my friend and sharing our observation on the topic of pandemic influence. We both are business owners and have noticed several different effects on the business (note: businesses with a technology background). I wondered what others observed in tehir business and/or career that they would never expect to happen?
stories.title: Ask HN: Covid cought you? – How has pandemic changed your business or career?
Discover great newsletters without filling up your inbox
Farm machinery giant John Deere plows into two right-to-repair lawsuits

stories.text:
Over 40 WordPress themes and 53 plugins have been found to be infected with backdoor shells, by unknown hackers exploiting several sites to gain admin access.

According to Jetpack, earlier versions of the popular add-ons were allegedly used to propagate backdoors as part of a supply chain attack, therefore customers of AccessPress Themes should opt for updated versions of the company’s WordPress themes and plug-ins.
stories.title: Backdoors discovered in 40 WordPress Themes and 53 Plugins
